trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.ProgressChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.ProgressChanged" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs> 類別。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker>類別。

trans-unit.source: The percentage of an asynchronous task that has been completed.
trans-unit.target: 非同步工作的完成百分比。

trans-unit.source: A unique user state.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的使用者狀態。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the asynchronous task progress percentage.
trans-unit.target: 取得非同步工作的進度百分比。

trans-unit.source: A percentage value indicating the asynchronous task progress.
trans-unit.target: 指出非同步工作進度的百分比值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A> property determines what percentage of an asynchronous task has been completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage%2A>屬性會決定在完成非同步工作的百分比。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.LoadProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.LoadProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> named `PictureBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>名為`PictureBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.LoadProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.LoadProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique user state.
trans-unit.target: 取得唯一的使用者狀態。

trans-unit.source: A unique <see cref="T:System.Object" /> indicating the user state.
trans-unit.target: 指出使用者狀態的唯一 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.LoadProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.LoadProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> named `PictureBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>名為`PictureBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.LoadProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.LoadProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
